Reviews.Title: Best cell phone for making phone calls!
Reviews.Author: Bill Carcot
Reviews.Content: This is an old-style flip phone that works great. If your looking for a cell phone to make & receive phone calls, this one is terrific. This is a CDMA phone which uses the Verizon network at a Tracfone price. I use about 1200 minutes a year which cost me a about $120.$10. a month for cell phone service. No contracts. I live in the country and the cell phone gets 4 bars from my house. Buy it, you won't regret it. Voice quality is also great.

Reviews.Title: lg220c trac fone
Reviews.Author: MARGE WIGHAUS
Reviews.Content: this trac phone is the best value out there owned for over 7 years cost of phone and cost of use are less than most others no problems with it ever
